name: Matchquest
description:
Make tile combos to fight enemies and progress in the game. Each color correspond to a different actions:

  • Blue: standard attack
  • Yellow: earn coins to spend at the store and upgrade your stats
  • Red: heal
  • Purple: magic attack 
  • Green: temporary armor

---

The game is still in development, many features are still to come, including more enemies and powers, bosses and achievements.

---

Made with Godot.

Sprite from characters and ennemy from Kenney
